alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 02 at 12:10PM CDT until May 06 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River at Fort Ripley affecting Crow Wing and Morrison Counties. Mississippi River At Aitkin affecting Aitkin and Crow Wing Counties. .High water and flooding continues this week along the Mississippi River. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Fort Ripley. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, This will cause minor flooding of rural areas near Fort Ripley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this week into early this weekend and continue falling. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.1 feet on 07/17/2016. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Mississippi River Fort Ripley 10.5 10.9 Tue 11 am CD 10.8 10.6 10.4 &&
info.instruction: Report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. More information and resources about spring flooding is available at www.weather.gov/duluth/spring-flooding. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon by 1215 PM CDT.
